thread.title: Daniel Craig and David Oyelowo to star in 'Othello' in NYC
thread.title_full: Daniel Craig and David Oyelowo to star in 'Othello' in NYC

author: senh
title: Daniel Craig and David Oyelowo to star in 'Othello' in NYC
text: BING NEWS: Daniel Craig and David Oyelowo to star in 'Othello' at New York Theatre Workshop in 2016 NEW YORK, N.Y. - A couple of big-time movie stars will be appearing off-Broadway next fall when Daniel Craig and David Oyelowo star in a production of William Shakespeare's "Othello" at New York Theatre Workshop. Sam Gold, a Tony-winner for "Fun Home" will ... 10/19/2015 - 6:38 am | View Link David Oyelowo and Daniel Craig Will Play Othello and Iago in the Shakespeare tragedy Next Fall David Oyelowo and Daniel Craig will both star in an upcoming off-Broadway production of "Othello," with Oyelowo playing the title character - the moor of Venice - and Craig as the villainous Iago in the Shakespeare tragedy, in the New York Theater Workshop ... 10/19/2015 - 6:30 am | View Link Daniel Craig and David Oyelowo to Star in 'Othello' in NYC A couple of big-time movie stars will be appearing off-Broadway next fall when Daniel Craig and David Oyelowo appear in a production of William Shakespeare's "Othello" at New York Theatre Workshop. Sam Gold, a Tony-winner for "Fun Home" will direct the ... 10/19/2015 - 6:27 am | View Link Daniel Craig, David Oyelowo to Co-Star Off-Broadway in 'Othello' Some serious star power is heading to the East Village next fall, when Daniel Craig will play the villainous Iago opposite David Oyelowo as the title character in William Shakespeare's tragedy, Othello, at New York Theatre Workshop. Sam Gold, who won ... 10/19/2015 - 5:30 am | View Link David Oyelowo and Daniel Craig to star in Othello British stars David Oyelowo and Daniel Craig are to star together in an Off Broadway production of Shakespeare's Othello next autumn. The James Bond actor will star as Iago in the play staged by the New York Theater Workshop (NYTW), with Selma actor ...
